53

1

A  Right. So, is that everything?

B  Erm, there's a small problem with my assistant. She wants more money, but I can't give her a pay rise.

A  Oh I see. Can she do some overtime?

B  Yes. That's a good idea!

2

A  What's the matter?

B  I have a really big problem. The Managing Director wants to reduce staff numbers in my department. So someone has to lose their job. But who?

A  That's a difficult decision.

B  Yes, it is!

3

A  So, what's your final decision?

B  I don't know. I can't decide.

A  Why don't you ask everyone in your team?

B  No. That's a bad idea. There are eight people so we'd get eight different opinions. We'll never find a solution that way.
